content: this adorable frog hat is a great project for everyone whether you are new to crocheting or have been crocheting for years this project is simple easy and pretty quick to complete plus who doesn t love a cute animal hat i have made these hats in a variety of colors but the most popular one is definitely the fern shade this pattern is one size but a row can be added or removed easily for better fit materials 5mm hook weight 4 yarn of choice in **four colors** base of hat i use a green about 1 skein white very small amount for eyes black very small amount for eyes and smile pink optional very small amount for cheeks yarn needle for sewing eyes cheeks and smile at end while this is a free pattern please do not distribute it as your own and if you make something with it please tag me so i can see and share @create_with_caitlyn on instagram
